Ragnar: I'm behind you. Perhaps that we could use this wreck too to
build a shuttle.

He stays in mech mode and goes right behind Wheeljack.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "Well, I'd say it's from Cybertron - I can't tell much else from 
> here," Jackie says, unaware that the barrage of contractions could 
> draw a negative reaction from his companion.  "Whoever's in it may 
> need help - let's check it out."  He breaks into a jog, heading for 
> the wreck.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Geez! I always keep forgetting some of my chars! Thanx!
> > 
> > Bic:
> > 
> > Ragnar veers off a bit and locks his sight with the fallen ship.
> > 
> > Ragnar: Aff, but I can not tell what it is...
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> > <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Last I checked, these two were out looking for the remains 
> of 
> > > the Clan ship - that puts them in good position, I think.
> > > 
> > > Wheeljack-X::
> > > 
> > > Jackie pulls up short and transforms to robot mode as he sees the 
> > > ship impact some distance away.  "Did you see that?" he asks 
> Ragnar.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > > > Ahhh. ok.. I figured that. Just wanted to verify.
> > > > 
> > > > IC: 
> > > > 
> > > > Placed the shuttle upon Automatic for a moment as she went over 
> to 
> > > another 
> > > > computer to analyze the data she gain after making a brief hack 
> > > into the 
> > > > memory core. Plus her little run in with Alpha Trion & Vector 
> Sigma 
> > > gave her 
> > > > a little insight. But .. not much. 
> > > > 
> > > > She gazed at the screen after entering the information. 
> According 
> > > to records, 
> > > > several were run off of Cybertron & to... 
> > > > 
> > > > "Earth," she was stunned to see the information. 
> > > > 
> > > > Moving back over to the controls, she punched in the coordinate 
> for 
> > > Earth. 
> > > > 
> > > > **************************
> > > > After some time of space flight, the shuttle neared Earth. 
> Maxima 
> > > walked 
> > > > towards the controls-
> > > > 
> > > > SKKREEE!! SSKKREEEEEEE!!!SSKKREEEE!!!
> > > > 
> > > > The ship shuddered as the alarms sounded. She stumbled as she 
> made 
> > > her way to 
> > > > the controls quickly. Feverishly moving over the controls to 
> regain 
> > > the ship, 
> > > > she noticed that an energy reading ahead of her was off the 
> charts. 
> > > > 
> > > > "What the-"
> > > > 
> > > > A bright flash of light... energy coursed through the ship as 
> it 
> > > shocked her. 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > "Ahhhh!" the blue bolts stunned her, knocking her from the seat 
> > > next to the 
> > > > controls to the floor.. she fell inconscious/offline soon there 
> > > after. 
> > > > 
> > > > ****************************
> > > > 
> > > > The Cybertronian shuttle appeared in Prehistoric Earth's orbit. 
> It 
> > > tumbled 
> > > > for a while, then it streaked towards Earth as it was pulled by 
> the 
> > > gravity 
> > > > of the planet. 
> > > > 
> > > > Over the skies, a fireball was seen as the shuttle was burning 
> up 
> > > upon entry, 
> > > > eventually crashing into the body of land that would become the 
> > > North 
> > > > America. 
> > > > 
> > > > The ship smoked, the only passenger inside was offiline & 
> > > unconscious. 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > OOC: I leave it up to who ever wishes to discover her first.
